name: Choral Organizations for Music Majors
title: MUSIC CONDUCT 364-0-20 Choral Organizations for Music Majors
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Registration is reserved for Music Majors/Minors.  Non-music students should register for the corresponding GEN_MUS course under the same catalog number.  Specific questions should be directed to the Music department.
